name: Dodge it (Eric Richard)
description:
You have to dodge all bullet and dont eat the bullet :)

HOW IT FITS THE THEME?

Well...Less size = more speed

More size = you go bye bye

HOW TO PLAY?

Simple

you just gotta go to green circle to get to the next level

and try to not eat the bullet

CONTROL

- Left click to start move

- ESC to pause

 BUG

apparently there's unexpected bug where you cant hit the play and quit button. Thats sad :( you can fix it by  hold the "about" button and use an up/down arrow key to navigate and enter to enter. Enjoy

Sorry didn't have much time and idea to make more levels.Hope u like it :)
